title: Just received a 14 day ban
body:
Here's my chat log for you all to make fun of:

Game 1
Primadonna: what the fuck.
Primadonna: seriously...

Primadonna: oh hi %%%
Primadonna: ?
Primadonna: whats to question %%%

Primadonna: i no longer care about this game
Primadonna: since ahri/kayn personality smell like shit
Primadonna: oh wow
Primadonna: another one
Primadonna: um
Primadonna: draven i dont like to talk shit because i know english isnt everyone's first language but
Primadonna: what
Primadonna: i was throwing shade
Primadonna: it went over ur head

Primadonna: yes hello
Primadonna: she sucks 2/7 big noob

Primadonna: oh wow
Primadonna: kayn going after the women on the team
Primadonna: watch out zyra

Primadonna: cringiest flash but u need lee to come kill me huh

Primadonna: why everyone in this game got a problem with me
Primadonna: and i wasnt talking about u rengo
Primadonna: after u kicked my ass 485456 times it wuld be unwarranted

Primadonna: asking a negative, rhetoric question doesnt count

Primadonna: yes that is true
Primadonna: doesnt mean i inted tho
Primadonna: and it was only cuz both ahri and kayn decided to make comments about me top

Primadonna: at least i feel better now
Primadonna: that yall mean to each other as well


None of this really makes sense without context, so I tried to break it up. "she sucks 2/7 big noob" is me talking about me btw. It's safe to assume I was banned because I said %%% twice (the ban came instantly after the game). It's funny because I didn't even think twice about using it because gay people say it to each other all the time lol. Regardless, no excuses, that's fair, I'm not saying I didn't deserve the ban. 

Anyway, I know it's very thin ice going forward, but _how_ thin is it? Should I just stop talking on League for the next year? I've put a lot of time and money in this account and will do whatever it takes to keep it. I'd be devastated if I lost it over using some stupid word me and my community use everyday. This is my first punishment ever, and I'm surprised it's this serious. I'm also surprised they permaban players this easily... 

tl;dr: i'm shook

Well that for sure was more than likely what played a major part in the trigger.

> [{quoted}](name=iamthegoatofwar,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=I9UaWiE9,comment-id=00050000000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-23T19:05:23.943+0000)
>
> Well that for sure was more than likely what played a major part in the trigger.

Yeah, at least I know it now. :/
So you said the censor words? That might the hate speech to sum for your 14 day ban.

*  Do not say the word %%% or %%%got in any way both in games and real life, it's insulting to people that aren't gay for one and they will take offense to it because you are calling them something they're not and while gays do say it to each other (which I disagree with but that's a whole other discussion) that doesn't make it right for it to be used as a general term for other people.


* Play  more talk less, a lot of what you said was completely unneeded in the game and could actually be considered mild harassment.


* You went to 14 day because of the words you said, you already aknowledged them so I don't see why you would be surprised about.

As for how thin is thing ice, anything even something small can now get you banned. I suggest you leave communication to only things you need to say  "enemy jungle is on way to 'insert lane' "   "mid headed towards 'insert lane' "   "I am going to try and gank 'insert lane' "  and for saying gj when somebody gets a good gank off or secures a kill that would otherwise got away or rescues an ally from being killed.  

Or your other choice is to not talk at all in game chat and just use the ping system, you have a lot of games to do this for before you will drop down from your 14 day ban so it will be hard work but I am sure you can do it so your account isn't in as much danger as it is now, good luck.

> Or your other choice is to not talk at all in game chat and just use the ping system, you have a lot of games to do this for before you will drop down from your 14 day ban so it will be hard work but I am sure you can do it so your account isn't in as much danger as it is now, good luck.

What if I go like 0/15 in a game? Lose power? I'm scared stuff like that will get me permed, or is it JUST toxic behavior?

the first one if it happens you can actually send a ticket to Riot to have a person look at the game, if you've generally had a bad game, ie just died a lot not ran straight into towers or the enemy purposefully to die for no reason then they will not see it as intentional feeding as any person looking at your game can tell whether it was feeding or just having a bad game.

The second one, usually going afk doesn't even warrant a ban at all just a leave buster so I'm not entirely sure how this would work against you, I would air on the side of caution but from what I know about how the system works this isn't something that gets you banned usually so it shouldn't get your banned now.

That being said the only person that can truly tell you is riot so if you do not get a response here I suggest going directly to support and asking them exactly what will get you banned and if these two things will also get your banned and see what their response is.

how thin? the instant you get off the 14 day ban any actually toxic game at all, will get you perma'd

and you're gonna be like that for awhile.
